title: [Self-directed] Workshop on Strengthening Design Thinking Skills with Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Design Theory Knowledge and Experience with Design Tools
context.additional_context: Practice-enhanced education centered on generative AI tool utilization via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners produce three or more creative design prototypes using generative AI tools.
Learners critically analyze AI-generated results and derive improvement points with over 70% accuracy.
Learners present three or more scenarios demonstrating the potential applications of generative AI in the design problem-solving process.

resources: AI Design Tool Apps (e.g., Canva AI, Adobe Express)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
